name: Search_Flights_Multi_Stops

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{
'fromId': 'BOM.AIRPORT',
'toId': 'AMD.AIRPORT',
'date': '2024-05-25'
},
…
]
Note: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects in the array.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

legs.description:
The legs must contain the fromId, toId and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

response_summary:
There are 925 available flights for your search, with options ranging from non-stop to two-stop journeys. The cheapest flight starts at $92.13 (rounded to $93), while the fastest option is priced at $113.90 (rounded to $114). The best overall deal costs $96.79 (rounded to $97). 

IndiGo is the most prominent airline with 637 flights available, offering the lowest price at $92.13. Air India follows with 613 flights starting at $102.90, while Air India Express has 13 flights with a minimum price of $199.75. 

For baggage, most flights include cabin luggage (924 options) and checked baggage (550 options). The flight durations range from 2 to 27 hours, with departure times spread throughout the day, including early morning (00:05–05:59), morning (06:00–11:59), and afternoon (12:00–17:59). 

A sample round-trip flight from Mumbai to Ahmedabad includes an outbound leg on May 25, 2025, departing at 01:00 and arriving at 02:20, with a return on May 28, 2025, departing at 23:45 and arriving back in Mumbai at 01:15 the next day. This flight includes one checked bag (max 33.1 lbs) and one cabin bag (max 15.4 lbs with size restrictions). The total price for this itinerary is $96.79, broken down into a base fare of $73.46 and taxes of $23.33. 

You can filter flights by stops, airlines, or departure times to find the best option for your travel needs.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers planning multi-stop or round-trip flights. It searches flight options based on specified legs (departure, arrival, and date), with sorting by best, cheapest, or fastest options. Users can filter by cabin class, passenger age groups, and currency. The response includes detailed flight information such as pricing, airlines, baggage allowances, and departure/arrival times. The legs parameter must include at least one departure-arrival pair.

enhanced_parameters.legs: Array of flight segments with departure, arrival, and date details.
enhanced_parameters.pageNo: Pagination number for flight search results.
enhanced_parameters.sort: Sorts flights by best value, price, or speed.
enhanced_parameters.cabinClass: Filters flights by seating class (economy to first).

totalCount.description: Total number of available flights for the search query.

filteredTotalCount.description: Total number of flights after applying filters (if any).

stops.description: List of flight options categorized by the number of stops.

ar_items.description: Details about flights with a specific number of stops.

numberOfStops.description: Number of stops for this flight category (e.g., 0 for non-stop).

count.description: Number of flights available with this number of stops.

minPrice.description: Minimum price for flights in this category.

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the price (e.g., USD).

units.description: Whole number part of the price.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the price in nanoseconds.

minPriceRound.description: Rounded minimum price for flights in this category.

currencyCode.description: Currency code for the rounded price (e.g., USD).

units.description: Whole number part of the rounded price.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the rounded price in nanoseconds (usually 0).

total.description: The total price of the flight including all fees and taxes.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the total price (e.g., USD).

units.description: The whole number part of the total price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the total price in nanoseconds (e.g., 790000000 represents $0.79).

baseFare.description: The base fare price of the flight before taxes and fees.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the base fare (e.g., USD).

units.description: The whole number part of the base fare.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the base fare in nanoseconds (e.g., 460000000 represents $0.46).

fee.description: Additional fees applied to the flight price.

units.description: The whole number part of the fee.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the fee in nanoseconds (e.g., 0 indicates no fee).

nanos.description: The fractional part of the tax in nanoseconds (e.g., 330000000 represents $0.33).

units.description: The whole number part of the rounded total price.

travellerReference.description: A unique identifier for the traveller (e.g., '1').

detectedPointOfSale.description: The point of sale (POS) where the flight search was detected, indicating the region or country from which the search originated (e.g., 'us' for the United States).

isPOSMismatch.description: Indicates whether there is a mismatch between the detected point of sale and the actual point of sale. A value of 'false' means no mismatch exists.

offerSalesCountry.description: The country where the flight offers are being sold, which may influence pricing and availability (e.g., 'us' for the United States).

travellerProducts.description: List of products associated with the traveller, such as baggage options

ar_items.description: Details of a specific product for the traveller

ruleType.description: Rule type for the baggage, e.g., 'PIECE_BASED'

maxWeightPerPiece.description: Maximum weight allowed per piece in the specified mass unit

massUnit.description: Unit of measurement for weight, e.g., 'LB' (pounds)

areAllSegmentsIdentical.description: Indicates whether all flight segments in the response have identical characteristics (e.g., luggage rules, duration, etc.).

segments.description: A list of flight segments, each containing details about luggage allowances and other segment-specific information.

ar_items.description: A nested array representing individual segments, each containing luggage-related details.
An object detailing the luggage rules for a specific flight segment.

luggageType.description: The type of luggage allowed for this segment (e.g., 'PERSONAL_ITEM').

maxPiece.description: The maximum number of luggage pieces allowed per passenger for this segment.

piecePerPax.description: The number of luggage pieces allocated per passenger for this segment.

price.description: The total price of the flight itinerary, including currency, units, and nanos for precise decimal representation.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the price (e.g., 'USD').

units.description: The integer part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price represented in nanoseconds (e.g., 790000000 for $0.79).

items.description: List of items included in the flight itinerary, such as passenger types and fare breakdowns.

ar_items.description: An item in the flight itinerary, detailing passenger scope, title, and price.

scope.description: The scope of the item, such as 'FLIGHT_ADULT' for adult passengers.

id.description: A unique identifier for the item (e.g., 'flight_adult').

title.description: A human-readable title for the item (e.g., 'Adult (1)').

price.description: The price associated with the item, including currency, units, and nanos.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the price (e.g., 'USD').

units.description: The integer part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price represented in nanoseconds.

items.description: List of sub-items, such as fare breakdowns (e.g., base fare).

ar_items.description: A sub-item detailing fare components.

id.description: A unique identifier for the sub-item (e.g., 'flight_adult-basefare').

title.description: A human-readable title for the sub-item (e.g., 'Flight fare').

price.description: The price associated with the sub-item, including currency, units, and nanos.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the price (e.g., 'USD').

units.description: The integer part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price represented in nanoseconds.

items.description: List of further nested items (empty in this example).

ar_items.description: A placeholder for deeper nesting (not used in this example).

addedItems.description: List of additional items (empty in this example).

ar_items.description: A placeholder for additional items (not used in this example).

token.description: A unique identifier token for the API response, likely used for session tracking or subsequent requests.

priceDisplayRequirements.description: An empty array indicating no specific requirements for displaying prices in this response.

ar_items.description: Expected to contain strings detailing any requirements for price display, though none are present here.

pointOfSale.description: Indicates the region or country where the point of sale is located, here set to 'us' for the United States.

tripType.description: Specifies the type of trip being queried, in this case 'ROUNDTRIP' indicating a round-trip journey.

appliedDiscounts.description: An empty array showing that no discounts were applied to the flights in this response.

ar_items.description: Would typically contain details of any discounts applied to the flight options.

offerKeyToHighlight.description: A unique key identifying a specific flight offer to highlight, likely used for promotional or featured display purposes.

extraProductDisplayRequirements.description: An empty object indicating no additional requirements for displaying extra products or services.

key.description: A label indicating the type of flight offer, such as 'CHEAPEST' for the most economical option.

offerToken.description: A unique token representing the flight offer, used for booking or further inquiries.

price.description: Detailed breakdown of the flight price.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the price is displayed, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: The whole number part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price, represented in nanoseconds (e.g., 130000000 for $0.13).

priceRounded.description: Rounded version of the flight price for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the rounded price is displayed, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: The whole number part of the rounded price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the rounded price, typically zero.

travellerPrices.description: List of price breakdowns for each traveller type (e.g., adult, child).

ar_items.description: Price details for a specific traveller.

travellerPriceBreakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of the price components for the traveller.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the total price, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: Whole number part of the total price.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the total price in nanoseconds.

baseFare.description: Base fare component of the price.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the base fare, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: Whole number part of the base fare.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the base fare in nanoseconds.

fee.description: Additional fees applied to the price.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the fee, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: Whole number part of the fee.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the fee in nanoseconds.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the tax, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: Whole number part of the tax.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the tax in nanoseconds.

totalRounded.description: Rounded total price for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the rounded total, e.g., 'USD'.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the rounded total, typically zero.

units.description: Whole number part of the rounded total.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the discount, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: Whole number part of the discount.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the discount in nanoseconds.

totalWithoutDiscount.description: Total price before any discounts are applied.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the total before discount, e.g., 'USD'.

units.description: Whole number part of the total before discount.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the total before discount in nanoseconds.

totalWithoutDiscountRounded.description: Rounded total price before any discounts for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: Currency of the rounded total before discount, e.g., 'USD'.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the rounded total before discount, typically zero.

units.description: Whole number part of the rounded total before discount.

travellerReference.description: Identifier for the traveller, e.g., '1' for the first traveller.

travellerType.description: Type of traveller, e.g., 'ADULT' for an adult passenger.

brandedFaresShownByDefault.description: Indicates whether branded fares are shown by default in the search results.

directFlightsOnlyFilterIgnored.description: Indicates whether the filter for direct flights only is ignored in the search results.

hideFlexiblePricesBanner.description: Indicates whether the banner for flexible prices is hidden in the search results.

cabinClass.description: The class of the cabin for the flight, indicating the type of seating and service level. In this case, it is 'ECONOMY'.

code.description: The airline code, typically an IATA code, representing the airline (e.g., '6E' for IndiGo).

name.description: The full name of the airline (e.g., 'IndiGo').

url.description: A URL linking to the airline's baggage policy page for reference.

isEligible.description: Indicates whether the user is eligible for the flight options or not.

isSearchEligible.description: Indicates whether the search query is eligible for flight results.

isBlockoutEligible.description: Indicates whether the user is eligible for blockout options (e.g., restricted booking periods).

atolProtectedStatus.description: Indicates the ATOL protection status of the flight booking. 'NONE' suggests no ATOL protection is included.

searchId.description: A unique identifier for the flight search session, used for tracking and reference purposes.

banners.description: An array that would typically contain promotional or informational banners related to the flight search. Currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: Expected to contain banner information, though none are present in this response.

isOffersCabinClassExtended.description: Indicates whether the cabin class options have been extended beyond the standard offerings. 'false' means no extended options are available.

cabinClassExtension.description: An object that would contain details about extended cabin class options. Currently empty, indicating no extensions are available.
